title: Game Progress Route
content:
you to kiss his foot but Lae'zel immediately reacts to this. She refuses to see you grovel to the goblin, and if you do so, will risk her disapproval. After that quick interaction, you will have another 4 options:

You can't be serious. I'd sooner spit in your face. [INTIMIDATION] How about you kiss my feet instead? Attack the goblin.

Take note that starting a fight with Crusher will cause the other goblins to join in and risk your party's life in danger. If you choose Intimidation, you will n
